passives.name: Point Runner
passives.effects: Builds up to 20% bonus movement speed over 2 seconds while near turrets, fallen turrets and Void Gates.

passives.name: Favor
passives.effects: Nearby enemy minions, killed by any ally other than you, will sometimes drop a coin that can be picked up to either grant 40 or restore 6% missing mana (minimum 10). Cannon minions will drop a coin as long as you don't kill them.

passives.name: Quest
passives.effects: Earn 750 using this item. Reward: Favor is upgraded to Emperor's Favor making champion takedowns grant both the gold and mana. You also grant 8% bonus movement speed to nearby allied champions moving toward you (1250 range).

active.effects: Grants nearby allies +40% movement speed for 3 seconds (60 second cooldown) (600 range).
